name: Sahil Yadav
warning_signs: Decreased urine output or dark-colored urine
follow_up_instructions: Restrict fluid intake to 1.5 liters per day
Schedule lab work for kidney function tests in 2 weeks
Weigh yourself daily and report sudden weight gain (>2 lbs in 24 hours)
Report any signs of infection immediately
discharge_summary:
Patient Sahil Yadav was admitted on 2025-10-02 with Glomerulonephritis. 
During hospitalization, patient was managed with Aspirin 81mg daily, Metoprolol 50mg twice daily, Insulin glargine 20 units at bedtime. 
Procedures performed included Arteriovenous fistula creation, Central line placement, Hemodialysis catheter placement.
Patient's condition improved and was stable at discharge. 
Discharged home with instructions to follow up with nephrologist and continue medications as prescribed. 
Patient educated on warning signs and dietary restrictions.
